divs: Sighting Detailsi was watching tv and gust looked out the window and thats when it caught my eye i though it was a star at first. but it was snowing out there was no other stars out and it was geting clouser and clouser i went and got a pare of binoculars and wached i moveing slow heading from east to south east before slowey disapering in to cloud cover and then hearing a cuple of jets headind twords it last location. durning and after the sighting i was fearful.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Waweig
